did.abstract: Memoirs, printed matter, and photographs relating to American foreign relations and commerce with Japan, Russia, Australia, China, and Ethiopia, 1906-1945, and to American participation in international narcotics control agencies; and motion picture film depicting scenes of daily life in China, 1930-1942. Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Use copies of some motion picture film in this collection are available for immediate access; digital copies also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org. To view other films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: American diplomat; consul, Vladivostok, Russia, 1914-1920; secretary of embassy to Japan, 1921-1924; chairman, United States delegation, Conference on the Limitation of the Manufacture of Narcotic Drugs, Geneva, 1931; consul general, Sydney, Australia, 1932-1935; consul general, Tientsin, China, 1935-1941; minister to Ethiopia, 1943-1945.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Memoirs, printed matter, and photographs relating to American foreign relations and commerce with Japan, Russia, Australia, China, and Ethiopia, 1906-1945, and to American participation in international narcotics control agencies; and motion picture film depicting scenes of daily life in China, 1930-1942.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The descriptions for the motion picture film reels are all taken from the intertitle cards that exist in each film and indicate the content that is contained in the motion picture film.
